text: Hi all, we use a Webhook as a trigger in a contact based flow. We receive data from shopify about every minute. It workd fine for a day but then it was stoped. First shopify deleted the HubSpot webhook URL because of to many bad responses. We integrated the URL again today but do not receive any data. Do you know why and what could be a solution?
Awesome Frans! Nice to hear that. We have had some difficult conversations with clients that are asking "why this is not default feature since I can read this value here".
